void printWithLineNumbers (  ostream &  out,
const char *  str,
const char *  preStr = "Line ",
int  nbrWidth = -1
) 
 

Prints a MC2String with line numbering before each line.

Parameters:
out The ostream to print to.
str The MC2String to print.
preStr The MC2String to print first on line before line number. Default "Line ".
nbrWidth The width of the line number field. -1 means that the number of lines should be calculated and width set accordingly. Default -1.

Returns:
